page.title: 17CLUTTON SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: The present school population is 147 pupils and Headmaster plus 6 teachers. The oldest child is Jody Probert who was 11 in September and the youngest is Jessica Beeson who will be 5 in August. We asked some of the children in each class what they like best and least about school. Wayne (11)liked football, cricket and swimming best. He did not like maths. Dean (5) liked making models and maths but hee does not like writing. Natalie(8) liked project work but does not like writing stories because they take too long. The part of school life that most children did not like is school assemblies. Most liked P.E. Thechildren who are leaving this year were asked for their memories of the school. They had all enjoyed school camp at Exmouth.They had enjoyed being members of teams and meeting children.
